rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, Homura? Did you manage
to talk to them?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0003
rows.name: I did. We had a pleasant chat.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0004
rows.name: What did you talk about?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0005
rows.name:
Everything that's happened since
I met you.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0006
rows.name:
And I told them not to worry because
I'm going to do everything in my
power to look after you.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm sorry, what? I can look after
myself, thank you very much.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0008
rows.name: I think not.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0009
rows.name:
If you go off on your own, you'll just
get yourself into trouble.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0010
rows.name:
Hohoho! Already bickering like you're
a married couple, eh?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0011
rows.name: Hey! Gramps!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0012
rows.name:
C-couple?! But really, I didn't mean
to...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0013
rows.name: Ahahaha! It was just a joke.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0014
rows.name:
Besides, you have to have that sort of
mettle to deal with Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0015
rows.name: Come on, Seiryuu, cut it out!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0016
rows.name:
Anyhow, we've done what we have
to here, right? Time we should be
getting back.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0017
rows.name:
Oh, we're leaving already? Can't
we talk for a little more?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0018
rows.name:
We can do that when we get back,
can't we?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0019
rows.name:
That's true, but the two of us rarely
get the opportunity to talk alone like
this.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm not sure you can say "alone" when
we've got Gramps tagging along...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0021
rows.name:
Eh? This old fogey getting in the way?
You want me to shove off?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0022
rows.name:
No one's telling you to shove off,
Seiryuu. Stop being such a child!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0023
rows.name: Hohoho! Youth is a beautiful thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0024
rows.name:
All right, what was it you wanted
to talk about?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0025
rows.name: What should I ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0026
rows.name: Do you miss your mom and dad?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0027
rows.name: Have you always sent money home?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0101
rows.name:
Hmm...I don't really know.
What makes you ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0102
rows.name:
Well, I'm a Blade, so I don't really know
much about parents. I was wondering
what it's like to have them.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0103
rows.name: Hmm... I'm not sure how to explain it.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0104
rows.name:
All I know about my parents is
what Gramps and Auntie Correl
have told me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0105
rows.name:
Honestly, I have hardly any memory
of them myself. It doesn't really feel
real.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0106
rows.name: Isn't that sort of sad?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0107
rows.name:
Not "sad" exactly... I've just never
really thought much about them.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0108
rows.name: Oh, I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0109
rows.name:
I mean, it's Gramps and the
villagers who've looked after
me this whole time.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0110
rows.name:
They're my family. Everyone in the
village is.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0111
rows.name:
And when you've got all these mums,
dads, brothers and sisters, it's kind of
hard to feel sad, you know?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0112
rows.name:
The downside to a big family is that
you can't go a day without getting an
earful from someone, eh!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0113
rows.name: Hey, give it a rest!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0201
rows.name:
Yeah, I've been sending money back
pretty much ever since I left the village
to set off to become a salvager.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0202
rows.name:
I mean, take a look around. There's
nothing here.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0203
rows.name:
Trade with other countries doesn't
really cut it, and being self-sufficient
only goes so far.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0204
rows.name:
What I earn is a pittance, but it's better
than nothing, I think.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0205
rows.name:
But it can't be easy for you either,
living the way you do...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0206
rows.name: You shouldn't push yourself so hard.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0207
rows.name:
Mmm, I guess. But I can't really leave
my family out in the lurch either.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0208
rows.name: Your family? You mean the villagers?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0209
rows.name:
That's right. Everyone in the village
is like family to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0210
rows.name:
I'll do everything in my power
to help them!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0211
rows.name:
They're all very grateful to Rex for
his work.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0212
rows.name:
Never thought a mischievous brat like
you'd grow some backbone!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0213
rows.name: Who are you calling a brat?!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0301
rows.name: Hahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0302
rows.name: What? What's so funny?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0303
rows.name: Sorry, I didn't mean to be rude.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0304
rows.name:
I just couldn't help but admire your
way of thinking.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0305
rows.name:
I'd love to have a family as big as
yours, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0306
rows.name:
What are you talking about, Homura?
You're already part of the family.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0307
rows.name:
...So can we take this as confession
of love?

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0308
rows.name:
Very bold of you to do so in front
of your parents, my boy!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0309
rows.name: Wha-?! Rex, hold on a second!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0310
rows.name:
N-no! That's not what I was trying
to say!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0311
rows.name:
You, Nia, Meleph, Zeke, and Tora
too...

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0312
rows.name: All of you... You're all family to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0313
rows.name:
So there's no reason to feel sad or
lonely, that's what I'm trying to say!

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0314
rows.name:
Huh, so much for the boy having
backbone. Sorry, Homura, this one's
going to be hard work.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0315
rows.name:
...Hahaha! That's all right. I've got
a surprising amount of patience.

rows.label: kizunatalk001_msg0316
rows.name:
Oi! What are you two going on
about? Jeez...
